name: Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues
body: Ron Burgundy is living in New York City with his wife Veronica Corningstone and son Walter. Everything changes when the boss fires Ron. His shot at redemption though comes in the form of the world's first 24-hour round the clock news channel.

comments.text: Nice movie with perfect actors We admires this skillful actors
Not such good it was a average movie

name: Pain & Gain
body: When an ambitious group of personal trainers (Mark Wahlberg, Dwayne Johnson and Anthony Mackie) go after the American Dream, they get caught up in a criminal enterprise that goes horribly wrong.

comments.text: Terrific movie, It has skillled actors that acts normally, and the story of this movie is perfect too
I love movies that Rock plays in that
Inspiring movie that makes you so enthusiastic about your life and dreams and increase your passion
Such a acting we saw from rock

name: The Fighter
body: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer tries to escape the shadow of his more famous, but troubled, older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

name: Ambulance
body: In this action thriller directed by Michael Bay, desperate brothers hijack an ambulance after their heist goes awry, spiraling into the most insane escape LA has ever seen.

comments.text: It was very good and enjotable movie, I love Jack Jinhehal playing
Perfect and amazing the story of movie was very good and unpredectabile

name: Faster
body: After 10 years in prison, Driver (Dwayne Johnson) is now a free man with a single focus â€“ hunting down the people responsible for brutally murdering his brother.

name: Forsaken
body: After abandoning his gun and reputation as a quick-draw killer, John Henry returns to his hometown in hopes of repairing his relationship with his estranged father.
In 24 hours -- Each hour a separate episode -- Counterterrorist agent Jack Bauer must stop a political crisis, while maintaining a balance with his family life.

name: The Contractor
body: Chris Pine stars as an elite Special Forces Sergeant who is discharged and cut-off from his benefits. Desperate to provide for his family, he contracts with a private military force and unravels a deep conspiracy, sending him on the run for his life.

comments.text: Very good movie it makes you thinking and work your brain

name: ROCKY HEAVYWEIGHT COLLECTION
body: Enjoy the franchise that made Sylvester Stallone a superstar with such classics as Rocky, Rocky II, Rocky III, Rocky IV, Rocky V and Rocky Balboa.

name: Wrath Of Man
body: A mysterious new cash truck security guard surprises his coworkers during a heist in which he unexpectedly unleashes precision skills. The crew is left wondering who he is and where he came from. Soon, the marksman's ultimate motive becomes clear.

comments.text: Such a Action movie, Jason Statham is greatest action player ever
